description.ko: 무한의 끝에서, 고대의 거울들이 허공으로 사라져가는 별의 마지막 빛을 붙잡습니다.
description.en: At the edge of the infinite, ancient mirrors catch the last light of a star screaming into the void.

prompt: A Dyson-swarm inspired structure of floating geometric mirrors surrounding a massive, dying blue giant star. Swirling nebulous gas clouds in deep violet (#3D1A78) and lavender (#E6E6FA) fill the infinite void, creating a sense of cosmic horror and majesty. Detailed textures of the weathered star-mirrors and intense volumetric lighting from the star's radiation. 8k resolution, raytracing, cinematic scale. Global illumination from the star scatters through the space dust, highlighting the event horizon of the surrounding abyss.
